text: وَأَنذِرۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡحَسۡرَةِ إِذۡ قُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

translation.en: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Day of Regret, when the matter will be concluded; and [yet], they are in [a state of] heedlessness, and they do not believe
translation.id: Dan berilah mereka peringatan tentang hari penyesalan, (yaitu) ketika segala perkara telah diputus, sedang mereka dalam kelalaian dan mereka tidak beriman
